description: BrmBackupManager: Table storing metadata about BRM (Billing and Revenue Management) system backups, including timestamp, location, identifier, backup type, and configuration details.  `dateTime`: Backup timestamp; `Area_Name`: Geographic area of the cell; `CellId`: Unique identifier of the cell site; `Id2`: Duplicate of CellId; `Id3`: Unknown identifier (likely redundant); `Id4`: Unknown identifier (likely redundant); `vsDataType`: Data type identifier; `vsDataFormatVersion`: Version of data format; `BrmBackupManager.backupDomain`: Backup domain (e.g., System); `BrmBackupManager.progressReport`: Backup progress status; `BrmBackupManager.brmBackupManagerId`: Unique backup manager ID; `BrmBackupManager.autoExport`: Auto-export status; `BrmBackupManager.autoExportUri`: Auto-export URI; `BrmBackupManager.manualBackupName`: Manual backup name; `BrmBackupManager.autoExportPassword`: Auto-export password; `BrmBackupManager.backupType`: Type of backup.
queries: Show me all backups from Area_Name 'London' with backupType 'Full' completed after 2023-10-26.
What is the `autoExportUri` for the most recent backup in the 'System' `backupDomain`?
Find all backups where `progressReport` is 'Failed' and `backupType` is 'Incremental'.
Retrieve the `manualBackupName` and timestamp for all backups with `brmBackupManagerId` greater than 1000.
List all unique `vsDataType` values used in backups performed in the last 7 days.
